name: Byters (Succeeding Lights)
description:
Spell out words to defeat opponents and level up and even evolve your byter!

Each creature has two types Element and Sphere which affects both damage done and taken.

                          Features

 *100 creatures to collect and battle 

 *5 story driven stages to advance through with boss battles !

 *small app size 27.94mb

 *only permission needed is access to storage to read and write to save file 

 *touch screen controls works on mobile phones and tablets, also works with keyboard

*Over 260,000+ words in game dictionary

           that's 3.2mbs of just words ! (Filtered)

         *Level up and even evolve your creatures !

         *Have a party of 6 creatures !

         *Wholesome and meaningful story

         *Educational for kids, and adults!

         *Play using touch screen, or keyboard !

           (Otg cable with PC keyboard compatible !)

         *Can turn off in-game music or sound effects,

           even play your own music along with in game

           sound effects
